flawed_nl_solution:
30% of Mars is made up of other elements because 100 - 50 - 20 = <<100-50-20=30>>30
Mars weighs 5000.0 tons because 150 / 0.3 = <<150/0.3=5000.0>>5000.0
The moon weighs 2500.0 tons because 5000.0 / 2 = <<5000.0/2=2500.0>>2500.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500.0, not 5000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
